name: Deep Network Analysis
description: Identifying and analyzing hidden PSN influence within organizations, institutions, and social networks.

cards.title: Mapping Hidden PSN Networks
cards.description: Identifying the relationships and connections that form covert PSN power structures.
bulletpoints: PSNs often embed themselves in key organizational nodes where they can exert maximum influence.
Analyze social and professional connections to identify patterns of favoritism and selective promotion.
Track repeated collaborations between questionable individuals to identify network hubs.
cards.summaryText: Find them at the choke points where influence flows strongest, decode favoritism and promotion patterns to see who's covering for whom, and follow repeat collaborations to pinpoint the network core.

cards.title: Spotting Behavioral Red Flags in Organizational Structures
cards.description: Recognizing early warning signs of PSN-controlled institutions and workplaces.
bulletpoints: Unexplained firings or demotions of competent individuals indicate PSN cleansing operations.
Excessive secrecy, rigid hierarchy, and punishments for dissent suggest PSN-controlled environments.
Organizational gaslighting—where a false version of reality is enforced—can indicate deeper infiltration.
cards.summaryText: Red-flag mysterious removals of talented people as purge operations, recognize lockdown secrecy and dissent-crushing as PSN hallmarks, and detect org-wide gaslighting as a sign of deep control.

cards.title: Tracking and Exposing Long-Term PSN Influence Operations
cards.description: Analyzing historical patterns to detect and document PSN activities over time.
bulletpoints: PSNs often maintain influence for decades through strategic placement of successors.
Examine financial and institutional records to uncover prolonged patterns of corruption.
Recognizing long-term disinformation campaigns helps trace their origins and disrupt their effects.
cards.summaryText: Study succession planning to see how they preserve power across generations, dig through old records to reveal decades of corruption patterns, and trace disinfo campaigns back to their source to cut them off at the root.
